protocol.name: P-G3709-1
protocol.text: 250 mL flasks of suspension cells were treated by the addition of 130 uL 8.82 M hydrogen peroxide to a final concentration of 10 mM samples were collected 3 h after treatment.

protocol.name: P-G3709-10
protocol.text: 250 mL flasks of suspension cells were treated by the addition of 120 ul of 100 mM salicylic acid to obtain a final concentration of 100 uM in the flask, samples were collected 3 h after treatment.

protocol.name: P-G3709-11
protocol.text: 250 mL flasks of suspension cells were treated by the addition of 480 ul of 10 mM rotenone to obtain a final concentration of 40 uM in the flask, samples were collected 12 h after treatment.

protocol.name: P-G3709-12
protocol.text: 250 mL flasks of suspension cells were treated by the addition of 100 ul of 120 mM rotenone to obtain a final concentration of 100 uM in the flask, samples were collected 12 h after treatment.

protocol.name: P-G3709-13
protocol.text: 250 mL flasks of suspension cells were treated by the addition of 100 ul of 0.24 M chloramphenicol to obtain a final concentration of 200 uM in the flask, samples were collected 12 h after treatment.

protocol.name: P-G3709-14
protocol.text: 250 mL flasks of suspension cells were treated by the addition of 120 ul of 1 M chloramphenicol to obtain a final concentration of 1 mM in the flask, samples were collected 12 h after treatment.

protocol.name: P-G3709-15
protocol.text: Approximately 5 ¼g of total RNA was processed to produce biotinylated cRNA targets.

protocol.name: P-G3709-2
protocol.text: 250 mL flasks of suspension cells were treated by the addition of 15 uL of 1 mM oligomycin dissolved in ethanol to obtain a final concentration in the flask of 0.125 uM, samples were collected 3 h after treatment.

protocol.name: P-G3709-3
protocol.text: 250 mL flasks of suspension cells were treated by the addition of 150 uL of 1 mM oligomycin dissolved in ethanol to obtain a final concentration in the flask of 1.25 uM, samples were collected 3 h after treatment.

protocol.name: P-G3709-4
protocol.text: 250 mL flasks of suspension cells were treated by the addition of chitin to obtain a final concentration of 50 mg/L in the flask, samples were collected 3 h after treatment.

protocol.name: P-G3709-5
protocol.text: 250 mL flasks of suspension cells were treated by the addition of 100 ul of 0.24 M chloramphenicol to obtain a final concentration of 200 uM in the flask, samples were collected 3 h after treatment.

protocol.name: P-G3709-6
protocol.text: 250 mL flasks of suspension cells were cold (10Â°C) treated, samples were collected 3 h after treatment.

protocol.name: P-G3709-7
protocol.text: 250 mL flasks of suspension cells were treated by the addition of flagellen to obtain a final concentration of 1 uM in the flask, samples were collected 3 h after treatment.

protocol.name: P-G3709-8
protocol.text: 250 mL flasks of suspension cells were treated by the addition of 480 ul of 10 mM rotenone to obtain a final concentration of 40 uM in the flask, samples were collected 3 h after treatment.

protocol.name: P-G3709-9
protocol.text: 250 mL flasks of suspension cells were treated by the addition of 12 ul of 100 mM salicylic acid to obtain a final concentration of 10 uM in the flask, samples were collected 3 h after treatment.
